direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods deal with the reason phrase, one setting it and the other retrieving it.
Both methods return reason phrases, but one is user-defined and the other is default based on error codes.
Both methods involve data conversion and manipulation, though for different purposes (encoding vs. retrieving reason phrase).
Both methods handle data parsing and manipulation, though for different purposes (decoding vs. retrieving reason phrase).

enhanced_by.reason: Setting the reason phrase is necessary to test the retrieval of it.
Setting the error code can influence the reason phrase, especially if using default phrases.
Setting the reason phrase before retrieving it ensures the state is correctly set up.
Comparing the retrieved reason phrase with the default can validate the correctness of the method.
